events.name: bank_account.created
events.description: Published when you link an external bank account to a Square account in the Seller Dashboard.

events.name: bank_account.disabled
events.description: Published when Square sets the status of a BankAccount to DISABLED.

events.name: bank_account.verified
events.description: Published when Square sets the status of a BankAccount to VERIFIED.

events.name: booking.created
events.description: Published when a booking is created.

events.name: booking.updated
events.description: Published when a booking is updated or cancelled.

events.name: card.automatically_updated
events.description: Published when a Card's expiration information or pan is automatically updated.

events.name: card.created
events.description: Published when a Card is created or imported.

events.name: card.disabled
events.description: Published when a Card is disabled.

events.name: card.forgotten
events.description: Published when a Card is GDPR forgotten/vaulted.

events.name: card.updated
events.description: Published when a Card is updated by the developer using the UpdateCard endpoint.

events.name: catalog.version.updated
events.description: Published when the catalog is updated.

events.name: customer.created
events.description: Published when a customer is created.

events.name: customer.custom_attribute.owned.deleted
events.description: Published when a customer custom attribute owned by the subscribing application is deleted.

events.name: customer.custom_attribute.owned.updated
events.description: Published when a customer custom attribute owned by the subscribing application is created or updated.

events.name: customer.custom_attribute.visible.deleted
events.description: Published when a customer custom attribute that is visible to the subscribing application is deleted.

events.name: customer.custom_attribute.visible.updated
events.description: Published when a customer custom attribute that is visible to the subscribing application is created or updated.

events.name: customer.custom_attribute_definition.owned.created
events.description: Published when a customer custom attribute definition is created by the subscribing application.

events.name: customer.custom_attribute_definition.owned.deleted
events.description: Published when a customer custom attribute definition created by the subscribing application is deleted.

events.name: customer.custom_attribute_definition.owned.updated
events.description: Published when a customer custom attribute definition created by the subscribing application is updated.

events.name: customer.custom_attribute_definition.visible.created
events.description: Published when a customer custom attribute definition that is visible to the subscribing application is created.

events.name: customer.custom_attribute_definition.visible.deleted
events.description: Published when a customer custom attribute definition that is visible to the subscribing application is deleted.

events.name: customer.custom_attribute_definition.visible.updated
events.description: Published when a customer custom attribute definition that is visible to the subscribing application is updated.

events.name: customer.deleted
events.description: Published when a customer is deleted.

events.name: customer.updated
events.description: Published when a customer is updated.

events.name: device.code.paired
events.description: Published when a Square Terminal has been paired with a Terminal API client and the device_id of the paired Square Terminal is available.

events.name: dispute.created
events.description: Published when a Dispute is created.

events.name: dispute.evidence.created
events.description: Published when evidence is added to a Dispute from the Disputes Dashboard in the Seller Dashboard, the Square Point of Sale app, or by calling either CreateDisputeEvidenceFile or CreateDisputeEvidenceText.

events.name: dispute.evidence.deleted
events.description: Published when evidence is removed from a Dispute from the Disputes Dashboard in the Seller Dashboard, the Square Point of Sale app, or by calling DeleteDisputeEvidence.

events.name: dispute.state.updated
events.description: Published when the state of a Dispute changes.

events.name: gift_card.activity.created
events.description: Published when a gift card activity is created.

events.name: gift_card.created
events.description: Published when a gift card is created.

events.name: gift_card.customer_linked
events.description: Published when a customer is linked to a gift card.

events.name: gift_card.customer_unlinked
events.description: Published when a customer is unlinked from a gift card.

events.name: gift_card.updated
events.description: Published when a gift card is updated.

events.name: inventory.count.updated
events.description: Published when the quantity is updated for a CatalogItemVariation.
